snippet.title: Loplight -  A twin-stick shooter taking inspirations from Hermetic lore and old alchemical concepts!
snippet.description:
Purchase on itch.io https://scumhead.itch.io/loplight?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt You are Edda, a young girl lost in a dying world.

The elements of the world have been unleashed, ancient demons stalk the lands.

Collect the pieces of Quintessence, ascend to a divine power, defeat the elder god harvesting the souls of the world.

➡️ More from scumhead https://scumhead.itch.io/?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt
➡️ More adventure games https://itch.io/games/genre-adventure?ac=qfCyYFQF-yt

#itchio #indiegames
